metadata.Title: CVE-2023-31486 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: HTTP::Tiny before 0.083, a Perl core module since 5.13.9 and availablestandalone on CPAN, has an insecure default TLS configuration where usersmust opt in to verify certificates.

criterions.comment: libhttp-tiny-perl: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
perl: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
